title: Peter Babej
tag-2: Peter Babej is Interim Head of Banking; Chairman of Banking, which includes the firm’s corporate, commercial and investment banking activities, and partners with Citi’s international franchises to drive global delivery of the firm’s resources across nearly 100 markets. Peter is a member of Citi's Executive Management Team and the Board of Citi Foundation.
tag-3: Previously, Peter served for four years as CEO of Citi Asia Pacific. Under his leadership, Citi expanded its institutional and wealth management businesses across the region, drove digital adoption across products and services, and focused its operating model through consumer banking divestitures in nine markets. Prior to his Asia Pacific role, Peter served as Global Head of the Financial Institutions Group, leading Citi to a top position in the sector.
tag-4: Before joining Citi in 2010, Peter served in senior roles at Deutsche Bank and Lazard, where he advised financial institutions in numerous landmark transactions globally.
tag-5: Peter holds a B.A. (summa cum laude) from the School of Public and International Affairs of Princeton, and a J.D. and Ph.D. from Harvard University. He is a member of the Council of Foreign Relations.
